Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: Visual Basic 6.0 からアップグレードされたアプリケーションが使用する OLE DB インターフェイスの実装を提供します。

span.span: Provides an implementation of the OLE DB interface for use by applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DeleteRows (int hChapterReserved, int cRows, int[] rghRows, out int[] rgRowStatus);

Public Sub DeleteRows (hChapterReserved As Integer, cRows As Integer, rghRows As Integer(), ByRef rgRowStatus As Integer())
public: void DeleteRows(int hChapterReserved, int cRows, cli::array <int> ^ rghRows, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] cli::array <int> ^ % rgRowStatus);

param.name: hChapterReserved
param.span: チャプター ハンドル。

span.span: The number of rows to be deleted.

param.name: rghRows
param.span: 削除する行のハンドルの配列。

span.span: An array of handles of the rows to be deleted.

param.name: rgRowStatus
param.span: rghRows に指定された各行のステータスを示す値が返される cRows 要素の配列。

span.span: An array with cRows elements in which to return values indicating the status of each row specified in rghRows.
